title: Homemade Sweetened Condensed Milk
directions: Add powdered milk, sugar, butter, vanilla, and ⅓ cup boiling water to blender and blend until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is smooth. If the mixture is too thick, add a bit more water and continue blending, up to an additional ⅓ cup.
ingredients: ⅓ cup to ⅔ cup boiling water
